title.rendered: “High Tension in Gaza: IDF Soldiers and Contractors Sustain Serious Injuries – A Review of Recent Incidents”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Earlier today (Monday), two IDF soldiers from the Yahalom unit were seriously injured in a battle in the southern Gaza Strip.

An employee of a contracting company working on behalf of the Ministry of Defense, who was on a mission in the area, was seriously injured, and two additional employees who were on missions in the area were lightly injured in the southern Gaza Strip.

Yesterday (Sunday), an IDF soldier from the Rotem Battalion, Givati Brigade, was seriously injured in a battle in the northern Gaza Strip.

In addition, the day before yesterday (Saturday), two soldiers from Battalion 51, Golani Brigade, were seriously injured as a result of an operational accident in the border area, near Nir Am.

The soldiers and civilians were evacuated for medical treatment at the hospital, their families have been updated.
